amendatorysection.catchline: Construction of contract; before or after breach.
amendatorysection.para: A contract may be construed either before or after there has been a breach thereof.

annotation.para: A contract may be construed under Declaratory Judgments Act either before or after there has been a breach thereof. Dorland v. Dorland, 175 Neb. 233, 121 N.W.2d 28 (1963).
Action is authorized after breach of contract of insurance. Hawkeye Casualty Co. v. Stoker, 154 Neb. 466, 48 N.W.2d 623 (1951).
